definition: (of diseases, accidents) to occur with a high incidence/(old) to score highly in the imperial exams
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Results Food-poisoning accidents happen more frequently in the third quarter.
sentences.chinese: 结果食物中毒事故第三季度高发。

sentences.english: People in the high-incidence area gastric nitrosamine compounds were significantly lower than the district.
sentences.chinese: 高发区人胃液中亚硝胺类化合物含量明显高于低发区。

sentences.english: The highest incidence of cases occurs during the summer months when rats and their fleas are most active and abundant.
sentences.chinese: 夏季老鼠及鼠蚤活跃并大量繁殖，为该病的高发期。

sentences.english: He pointed out the gravity of the situation in HIV-hit regions.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，在艾滋病高发地区的情况非常严峻。

sentences.english: It will set up workplace prevention projects in industrial sectors at higher risk.
sentences.chinese: 要在一些艾滋病高发区的企业内开展预防工作。

sentences.english: Lightning occurs the most frequently in the urban area, secondly in the northeast part of the city.
sentences.chinese: 广州市区是雷电的高发区，其次是其东北部山区。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The hospital′s infection rate of the male psychiatric ward is controllable and preventable.
sentences.chinese: 结论精神科男病区的医院感染率高发是可控可防的。

sentences.english: Such children would be at high risk of genetic abnormality.
sentences.chinese: 这样的孩子将是遗传疾病的高发人群。

sentences.english: Winter is a high-incidence season for heart disease, due to the cooling climate.
sentences.chinese: 冬天是心脏病的高发季节，这与气候转冷有关。

sentences.english: According to these results, it is the powerful evidence to explain the causes of high mortality of lung cancer in Xuanwel County.
sentences.chinese: 该结果为论证宣威肺癌高发的原因提供了很好的依据。

sentences.english: What is the epidemiology and impact of colorectal cancer in high-incidence countries?
sentences.chinese: 在结直肠癌高发国中其流行病学和影响是怎样的？

sentences.english: Our country has high prevalence with chronic hepatitis C.
sentences.chinese: 我国是丙型肝炎的高发区。
限制自己的出行，不要让自己暴露于风险高发地。

sentences.english: High rates of chronic infections are also found in the Amazon and the southern parts of eastern and central Europe.
sentences.chinese: 亚马逊和中东欧南部地区亦为慢性感染高发区。

sentences.english: The welfare-labeled corruption happened in frequency at the end of a year.
sentences.chinese: 例句年终岁尾是福利腐败的高发期。

sentences.english: The Qinba Mountain Area is one of the regions with high affecting of mental retardation (MR) in China.
sentences.chinese: 秦巴山区是我国精神发育迟滞病症的高发区之一。

definition: to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
area particularly hard-hit by a disaster/disaster area
to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
occurrence (refers to time and place esp. of a criminal act)/to take place/to occur/to advertise freelance work
